name: Ghost Mountain
description:
A short & eerie text adventure for the Commodore 64. Dare you approach Ghost Mountain? Grapple with debilitating dread in this slice of old-school interactive fiction.

Made with PunyInform, a library for writing text adventures for old computers. Enjoy (?) some Infocom-style adventuring on the humble C64. Content warning: vague unease; obscure threat; endless trees.  Not recommended for orophobes.

Zip file includes .d64 file for Commodore 64, plus a .z3 file that will run on any platform with a Z-Machine interpreter. I recommend playing it on C64 though.
